name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader.”
”Ask Haiku Reader for a poem.”
”Open Haiku Reader to read for me.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku Reader is a skill to listen to fun, interesting haikus. You can ask Alexa to read you a haiku or simply say Alexa, open Haiku Reader. It will start reading you haiku.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
